thread.title: This Is What New Linkin Park Single Would Sound Like If They Still Played Nu Metal [News]
thread.title_full: This Is What New Linkin Park Single Would Sound Like If They Still Played Nu Metal [News]

title: This Is What New Linkin Park Single Would Sound Like If They Still Played Nu Metal [News]
text:
This Is What New Linkin Park Single Would Sound Like If They Still Played Nu Metal The actually heavy version of "Heavy." UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 16 hours ago 15 
The dudes of Bloodywood presented an interesting rendition of the latest Linkin Park single " Heavy ," sharing their take on what the tune would sound like in the vain of old, nu-metal LP. 
Thanking Linkin Park for being their "gateway drug" into the world of metal, the guys still stressed the track sucks in their opinion, noting: 
"It's no secret, we are not very fond of the new Linkin Park track - 'Heavy.' So here's a nu metal cover of their song. We have tried to make it sound like it was a part of ' Hybrid Theory '/' Meteora ' in this cover. Hope you dig!" 
The cover is available below.
